directions.step: Shift flour, baking powder, sugar & salt together.
Beat egg in cup and add beaten egg and 1 1/2 cups whole milk to make a batter. stir well.
Add melted shortening and beat until light and thoroughly mixed.
Pour into greased shallow pan or greased muffin rings.
Bake in hot oven at 425F for 25 minutes.
Cut into squares if cooked in shallow pan.

recipe.story: After my mother-in-law Marjorie Anderson died, Beth and I found this recipe written on the "extra recipes" page in a local cookbook in her cupboard. This was published by The Episcopal Churchwomen, Church of Ascension, Mt. stering, Kentucky.
